name: Get Up The Fucking Hill
description:
Get Up The Fucking Hill is a class based multiplayer driving game.

Currently in Early Alpha,  this game is currently a buggy boi but it's a fun and free. The game focuses on driving skill, entertaining physics, interesting maps, and car handling. The game takes inspiration from rock crawling, however does not attempt to be realistic.

Early Alpha Notice:
This game is in a Prototype state. Only a limited number of players are able to play right now, if there is a huge demand you may not be able to play until a slot is opened. Please disregard the standard assets, these are placeholders for vehicles in development. I'm working on it. There's a lot of bugs. I know about some of them but  I would like to know if you experience something. Just post in the comments.

What are you waiting for? Grab a friend get up the fucking hill already!
